help tools functions

headcomments

Display Nelson function header comments.

Syntax

headcomments(function_name)
ce = headcomments(function_name)

Input argument

function_name

a string: function name.

Output argument

ce

a cell of strings

Description

head_comments displays the function header comments.

Comments are read from the associated .nlf file.

Nelson predefined functions have no header comments.

Example

headcomments('buildhelp')
ce = headcomments('buildhelp')

See also

doc, which.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
